## connection.proto





### ConnectionStatus
Connection status (excludes credentials - credentials stay server-side)


| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| id | [string](#string) |  |  |
| name | [string](#string) |  |  |
| state | [ConnectionState](#io-typestream-grpc-ConnectionState) |  |  |
| error | [string](#string) |  |  |
| last_checked | [google.protobuf.Timestamp](#google-protobuf-Timestamp) |  |  |
| config | [DatabaseConnectionConfigPublic](#io-typestream-grpc-DatabaseConnectionConfigPublic) |  | Public config (no password) |








### CreateElasticsearchSinkConnectorRequest
Create Elasticsearch sink connector


| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| connection_id | [string](#string) |  |  |
| connector_name | [string](#string) |  |  |
| topics | [string](#string) |  |  |
| index_name | [string](#string) |  |  |
| document_id_strategy | [string](#string) |  | RECORD_KEY, TOPIC_PARTITION_OFFSET |
| write_method | [string](#string) |  | INSERT, UPSERT |
| behavior_on_null_values | [string](#string) |  | IGNORE, DELETE, FAIL |

| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| success | [bool](#bool) |  |  |
| error | [string](#string) |  |  |
| connector_name | [string](#string) |  |  |








### CreateJdbcSinkConnectorRequest
Create JDBC sink connector (server-side credential resolution)


| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| connection_id | [string](#string) |  | ID of registered connection (server looks up credentials) |
| connector_name | [string](#string) |  | Name for the Kafka Connect connector |
| topics | [string](#string) |  | Topic(s) to consume from |
| table_name | [string](#string) |  | Target database table |
| insert_mode | [string](#string) |  | insert, upsert, or update |
| primary_key_fields | [string](#string) |  | Comma-separated list of primary key fields (for upsert/update) |








### CreateJdbcSinkConnectorResponse



| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| success | [bool](#bool) |  |  |
| error | [string](#string) |  |  |
| connector_name | [string](#string) |  | Name of created connector |








### CreateWeaviateSinkConnectorRequest
Create Weaviate sink connector


| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| connection_id | [string](#string) |  |  |
| connector_name | [string](#string) |  |  |
| topics | [string](#string) |  |  |
| collection_name | [string](#string) |  |  |
| document_id_strategy | [string](#string) |  | NoIdStrategy, KafkaIdStrategy, FieldIdStrategy |
| document_id_field | [string](#string) |  |  |
| vector_strategy | [string](#string) |  | NoVectorStrategy, FieldVectorStrategy |
| vector_field | [string](#string) |  |  |
| timestamp_field | [string](#string) |  | Optional: field name for timestamp conversion (empty = no transform) |

### DatabaseConnectionConfig
Database connection configuration


| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| id | [string](#string) |  |  |
| name | [string](#string) |  |  |
| database_type | [DatabaseType](#io-typestream-grpc-DatabaseType) |  |  |
| hostname | [string](#string) |  | Hostname for server health checks (e.g., "localhost") |
| port | [int32](#int32) |  |  |
| database | [string](#string) |  |  |
| username | [string](#string) |  |  |
| password | [string](#string) |  |  |
| connector_hostname | [string](#string) |  | Hostname for Kafka Connect connectors (e.g., "postgres" in Docker) |

| database | [string](#string) |  |  |

| connector_hostname | [string](#string) |  | password intentionally excluded |








### ElasticsearchConnectionConfig

| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| id | [string](#string) |  |  |
| name | [string](#string) |  |  |
| connection_url | [string](#string) |  | e.g., "http://localhost:9200" |
| username | [string](#string) |  | Optional: for authentication |
| password | [string](#string) |  | Optional: for authentication |
| connector_url | [string](#string) |  | For Kafka Connect (e.g., "http://elasticsearch:9200") |

### WeaviateConnectionConfig
Weaviate connection configuration


| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| id | [string](#string) |  |  |
| name | [string](#string) |  |  |
| rest_url | [string](#string) |  | e.g., "http://localhost:8090" |
| grpc_url | [string](#string) |  | e.g., "localhost:50051" |
| grpc_secured | [bool](#bool) |  |  |
| auth_scheme | [string](#string) |  | "NONE" or "API_KEY" |
| api_key | [string](#string) |  | For Weaviate Cloud (server-side only) |
| connector_rest_url | [string](#string) |  | For Kafka Connect (e.g., "http://weaviate:8080") |
| connector_grpc_url | [string](#string) |  | For Kafka Connect (e.g., "weaviate:50051") |

### ConnectionState


| Name | Number | Description |
| ---- | ------ | ----------- |
| CONNECTION_STATE_UNSPECIFIED | 0 |  |
| CONNECTED | 1 |  |
| DISCONNECTED | 2 |  |
| ERROR | 3 |  |
| CONNECTING | 4 |  |





### DatabaseType


| Name | Number | Description |
| ---- | ------ | ----------- |
| DATABASE_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED | 0 |  |
| POSTGRES | 1 |  |
| MYSQL | 2 |  |


 

 




### ConnectionService


| Method Name | Request Type | Response Type | Description |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------- | ------------|
| RegisterConnection | [RegisterConnectionRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-RegisterConnectionRequest) | [RegisterConnectionResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-RegisterConnectionResponse) | Register a database connection for monitoring |
| UnregisterConnection | [UnregisterConnectionRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-UnregisterConnectionRequest) | [UnregisterConnectionResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-UnregisterConnectionResponse) | Unregister a connection (stop monitoring) |
| GetConnectionStatuses | [GetConnectionStatusesRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-GetConnectionStatusesRequest) | [GetConnectionStatusesResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-GetConnectionStatusesResponse) | Get current status of all monitored connections |
| TestConnection | [TestConnectionRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-TestConnectionRequest) | [TestConnectionResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-TestConnectionResponse) | Test a connection immediately (one-shot, doesn't register) |
| CreateJdbcSinkConnector | [CreateJdbcSinkConnectorRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-CreateJdbcSinkConnectorRequest) | [CreateJdbcSinkConnectorResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-CreateJdbcSinkConnectorResponse) | Create a JDBC sink connector using a registered connection Server resolves credentials from connection ID - credentials never sent to UI |
| RegisterWeaviateConnection | [RegisterWeaviateConnectionRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-RegisterWeaviateConnectionRequest) | [RegisterWeaviateConnectionResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-RegisterWeaviateConnectionResponse) | Weaviate connection management |
| GetWeaviateConnectionStatuses | [GetWeaviateConnectionStatusesRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-GetWeaviateConnectionStatusesRequest) | [GetWeaviateConnectionStatusesResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-GetWeaviateConnectionStatusesResponse) |  |
| CreateWeaviateSinkConnector | [CreateWeaviateSinkConnectorRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-CreateWeaviateSinkConnectorRequest) | [CreateWeaviateSinkConnectorResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-CreateWeaviateSinkConnectorResponse) |  |
| RegisterElasticsearchConnection | [RegisterElasticsearchConnectionRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-RegisterElasticsearchConnectionRequest) | [RegisterElasticsearchConnectionResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-RegisterElasticsearchConnectionResponse) | Elasticsearch connection management |
| GetElasticsearchConnectionStatuses | [GetElasticsearchConnectionStatusesRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-GetElasticsearchConnectionStatusesRequest) | [GetElasticsearchConnectionStatusesResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-GetElasticsearchConnectionStatusesResponse) |  |
| CreateElasticsearchSinkConnector | [CreateElasticsearchSinkConnectorRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-CreateElasticsearchSinkConnectorRequest) | [CreateElasticsearchSinkConnectorResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-CreateElasticsearchSinkConnectorResponse) |  |

### DbSinkConfig
Configuration for DB sink connectors (credentials resolved server-side)


| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| node_id | [string](#string) |  |  |
| connection_id | [string](#string) |  | Server resolves credentials from this |
| table_name | [string](#string) |  |  |
| insert_mode | [string](#string) |  |  |
| primary_key_fields | [string](#string) |  |  |
| intermediate_topic | [string](#string) |  | Optional - server auto-generates if empty |








### DbSinkNode

### ElasticsearchSinkConfig

| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |

| index_name | [string](#string) |  |  |
| document_id_strategy | [string](#string) |  | RECORD_KEY, TOPIC_PARTITION_OFFSET |
| write_method | [string](#string) |  | INSERT, UPSERT |
| behavior_on_null_values | [string](#string) |  | IGNORE, DELETE, FAIL |

### JobInfo



| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| job_id | [string](#string) |  |  |
| state | [JobState](#io-typestream-grpc-JobState) |  |  |
| start_time | [int64](#int64) |  | Unix timestamp in milliseconds |
| graph | [PipelineGraph](#io-typestream-grpc-PipelineGraph) |  | Optional: the job's pipeline graph |
| throughput | [JobThroughput](#io-typestream-grpc-JobThroughput) |  | Throughput metrics |
| weaviate_sinks | [WeaviateSinkConfig](#io-typestream-grpc-WeaviateSinkConfig) | repeated | Weaviate sink configs for this job |
| elasticsearch_sinks | [ElasticsearchSinkConfig](#io-typestream-grpc-ElasticsearchSinkConfig) | repeated | Elasticsearch sink configs for this job |








### JobThroughput



| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| messages_per_second | [double](#double) |  | Current processing rate (messages/sec) |
| total_messages | [int64](#int64) |  | Total messages processed since job start |
| bytes_per_second | [double](#double) |  | Current bandwidth consumption (bytes/sec) |
| total_bytes | [int64](#int64) |  | Total bytes processed since job start |

| Field | Type | Label | Description |

| document_id_strategy | [string](#string) |  |  |
| document_id_field | [string](#string) |  |  |
| vector_strategy | [string](#string) |  |  |
| vector_field | [string](#string) |  |  |
| timestamp_field | [string](#string) |  | Optional: field name for timestamp conversion (empty = no transform) |

### Encoding


| Name | Number | Description |
| ---- | ------ | ----------- |
| STRING | 0 |  |
| NUMBER | 1 |  |
| JSON | 2 |  |
| AVRO | 3 |  |
| PROTOBUF | 4 |  |





### JobState


| Name | Number | Description |
| ---- | ------ | ----------- |
| JOB_STATE_UNSPECIFIED | 0 |  |
| STARTING | 1 |  |
| RUNNING | 2 |  |
| STOPPING | 3 |  |
| STOPPED | 4 |  |
| FAILED | 5 |  |
| UNKNOWN | 6 |  |

| ----------- | ------------ | ------------- | ------------|

| CreatePreviewJob | [CreatePreviewJobRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-CreatePreviewJobRequest) | [CreatePreviewJobResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-CreatePreviewJobResponse) |  |
| StopPreviewJob | [StopPreviewJobRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-StopPreviewJobRequest) | [StopPreviewJobResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-StopPreviewJobResponse) |  |
| StreamPreview | [StreamPreviewRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-StreamPreviewRequest) | [StreamPreviewResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-StreamPreviewResponse) stream |  |
| InferGraphSchemas | [InferGraphSchemasRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-InferGraphSchemasRequest) | [InferGraphSchemasResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-InferGraphSchemasResponse) |  |

## state_query.proto





### GetAllValuesRequest



| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| store_name | [string](#string) |  | Name of the state store to query |
| limit | [int32](#int32) |  | Maximum number of entries to return (default: 100) |
| from_key | [string](#string) |  | Reserved for future pagination support - not currently implemented |








### GetValueRequest



| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| store_name | [string](#string) |  | Name of the state store to query |
| key | [string](#string) |  | The key to look up. Note: This is used directly as a string key. Complex key types (structs, etc.) are not supported. For stores with complex keys, use GetAllValues and filter client-side. |








### GetValueResponse



| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| found | [bool](#bool) |  | True if the key was found in the store |
| value | [string](#string) |  | String representation of the value, empty if not found |








### KeyValuePair



| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| key | [string](#string) |  | JSON-serialized representation of the key. Format depends on the key's schema type: - String: "\"value\"" (JSON string) - Int/Long: "123" (JSON number) - Struct: "\{\"field\": \"value\"\}" (JSON object) |
| value | [string](#string) |  | String representation of the value (for count operations, this is the count as a string) |








### ListStoresRequest









### ListStoresResponse



| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| stores | [StoreInfo](#io-typestream-grpc-StoreInfo) | repeated |  |








### StoreInfo



| Field | Type | Label | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| name | [string](#string) |  | The name of the state store (e.g., "job-id-count-store-0") |
| job_id | [string](#string) |  | The ID of the job that owns this store |
| approximate_count | [int64](#int64) |  | Approximate number of entries in the store (from RocksDB metadata) |





 

 

 




### StateQueryService
StateQueryService provides interactive query capabilities for KTable state stores
from running Kafka Streams jobs. State stores are only queryable when the underlying
Kafka Streams application is in RUNNING state.

Key Serialization:
Keys returned by GetAllValues are JSON-serialized representations of the key schema.
For example: a string key "hello" becomes the JSON string "\"hello\"", a struct becomes \{"field": "value"\}.

Limitation:
GetValue currently only supports simple string keys. For complex keys (structs, etc.),
use GetAllValues and filter on the client side.

| Method Name | Request Type | Response Type | Description |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------- | ------------|
| ListStores | [ListStoresRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-ListStoresRequest) | [ListStoresResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-ListStoresResponse) | Lists all queryable state stores from running Kafka Streams jobs. Only stores from jobs in RUNNING state are included. Stores that cannot be queried (e.g., during rebalancing) are omitted. |
| GetAllValues | [GetAllValuesRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-GetAllValuesRequest) | [KeyValuePair](#io-typestream-grpc-KeyValuePair) stream | Streams all key-value pairs from a state store with optional limit. Keys are JSON-serialized and may be primitives or complex objects depending on the key schema. Returns NOT_FOUND if the store doesn't exist, UNAVAILABLE if the job isn't running. |
| GetValue | [GetValueRequest](#io-typestream-grpc-GetValueRequest) | [GetValueResponse](#io-typestream-grpc-GetValueResponse) | Retrieves a single value from a state store by key. Note: Currently only supports simple string keys. For complex keys, use GetAllValues. Returns NOT_FOUND if the store doesn't exist, UNAVAILABLE if the job isn't running. |

| .proto Type | Notes | C++ | Java | Python | Go | C# | PHP | Ruby |
| ----------- | ----- | --- | ---- | ------ | -- | -- | --- | ---- |
| <a name="double" /> double |  | double | double | float | float64 | double | float | Float |
| <a name="float" /> float |  | float | float | float | float32 | float | float | Float |
| <a name="int32" /> int32 | Uses variable-length encoding. Inefficient for encoding negative numbers  if your field is likely to have negative values, use sint32 instead. | int32 | int | int | int32 | int | integer | Bignum or Fixnum (as required) |
| <a name="int64" /> int64 | Uses variable-length encoding. Inefficient for encoding negative numbers  if your field is likely to have negative values, use sint64 instead. | int64 | long | int/long | int64 | long | integer/string | Bignum |
| <a name="uint32" /> uint32 | Uses variable-length encoding. | uint32 | int | int/long | uint32 | uint | integer | Bignum or Fixnum (as required) |
| <a name="uint64" /> uint64 | Uses variable-length encoding. | uint64 | long | int/long | uint64 | ulong | integer/string | Bignum or Fixnum (as required) |
| <a name="sint32" /> sint32 | Uses variable-length encoding. Signed int value. These more efficiently encode negative numbers than regular int32s. | int32 | int | int | int32 | int | integer | Bignum or Fixnum (as required) |
| <a name="sint64" /> sint64 | Uses variable-length encoding. Signed int value. These more efficiently encode negative numbers than regular int64s. | int64 | long | int/long | int64 | long | integer/string | Bignum |
| <a name="fixed32" /> fixed32 | Always four bytes. More efficient than uint32 if values are often greater than 2^28. | uint32 | int | int | uint32 | uint | integer | Bignum or Fixnum (as required) |
| <a name="fixed64" /> fixed64 | Always eight bytes. More efficient than uint64 if values are often greater than 2^56. | uint64 | long | int/long | uint64 | ulong | integer/string | Bignum |
| <a name="sfixed32" /> sfixed32 | Always four bytes. | int32 | int | int | int32 | int | integer | Bignum or Fixnum (as required) |
| <a name="sfixed64" /> sfixed64 | Always eight bytes. | int64 | long | int/long | int64 | long | integer/string | Bignum |
| <a name="bool" /> bool |  | bool | boolean | boolean | bool | bool | boolean | TrueClass/FalseClass |
| <a name="string" /> string | A string must always contain UTF-8 encoded or 7-bit ASCII text. | string | String | str/unicode | string | string | string | String (UTF-8) |
| <a name="bytes" /> bytes | May contain any arbitrary sequence of bytes. | string | ByteString | str | []byte | ByteString | string | String (ASCII-8BIT) |
